Container.Name: Notifiarr
Container.Overview:
Official Notifiarr Client This application provides the gateway for media requests to your starr application. https://Notifiarr.com
Edit config file in appdata folder after install; add starr app configs and plex url. Variables defined in unRAID config override config file settings. Must be privileged to report system drive details (for snapshot notifications). Mount additional paths anywhere to report drive space usage.

Config.Name: Notifiarr API Key
Config.Description: Container Variable: DN_API_KEY - API key from notifiarr.com

Config.Name: Plex Token
Config.Description: Container Variable: DN_PLEX_TOKEN - This is YOUR token from your plex session, see https://bit.ly/3y4cjRe

Config.Name: Plex URL
Config.Description: Container Variable: DN_PLEX_URL - URL for your Plex server

Config.Name: WebPort
Config.Description: Container Port: 5454 - Port only needs exposure when not reverse proxying this application.

Config.Name: Storage Disk 1
Config.Description: Set this and add more disks to report storage usage.

Config.Name: Users
Config.Description: Container Path: /var/run/utmp - This allows counting logged in users on unRAID.

Config.Name: ID File
Config.Description: Container Path: /etc/machine-id - This requirement allows Notifiarr to uniquely identify your server.
